headline: 3 ways Buffett's successor can keep Berkshire growing
summary: Warren Buffett will officially step down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) at the end of the year, with vice chairman Greg Abel set to replace him. The Glenview Trust Company chief investment officer, Bill Stone, explains what Abel should (and should not) do as he readies to take the helm of the conglomerate. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Investors Love Warren Buffett, So Why Aren’t They Listening to His Warning?
summary: Warren Buffett’s remarkable success over six decades has turned Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-A)(NYSE:BRK-B) into a phenomenon with something close to a cult following. Since assuming the helm of Berkshire in the mid-1960’s, the “Oracle of Omaha” has delivered better than 5 million percent returns, about 20% annually or twice those of the S&P 500 over the ... Investors Love Warren Buffett, So Why Aren’t They Listening to His Warning?

headline: Berkshire Hathaway basics: 5 post–Warren Buffett questions to ask
summary: Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) CEO Warren Buffett is set to pass over the chief executive reins to his successor, Greg Abel, on Jan. 1, 2026. Buffett will remain on the company's board as chairman. Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre, who also hosts Yahoo Finance's Stocks in Translation podcast, breaks down everything investors need to know about the company and what to keep an eye on with Abel at the helm next year. Catch more Stocks in Translation, with new episodes every Tuesday and Thursday. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Berkshire after Buffett: What Abel needs to win over Wall Street
summary: Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) CEO Warren Buffett is set to retire next year, leaving Greg Abel to lead as the company's next CEO. Boyar Research president Jonathan Boyar sits down with Market Domination host Josh Lipton to discuss his expectations for Berkshire after Buffett's departure and what the legendary investor's successor needs to do once he assumes the CEO role. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
